docs.snippet: George Dower, second mate of the packet ship Devonshire, was put on trial, charged with the murder of a seaman named Humphreys on board the ship While on her passage from this port to London.

headline.main: LAW REPORTS.; MURDER ON THE HIGH SEAS. Trial of George Dower in the United States Circuit Court Before Judge Smalley.

docs.lead_paragraph: George Dower, second mate of the packet ship Devonshire, was put on trial, charged with the murder of a seaman named Humphreys on board the ship While on her passage from this port to London.

headline.main: Enterprise of the New-York City Press--Pro Rata to the Rescue; Rata to the Rescue. From the Buffalo Courier.

docs.snippet: The Niagara, with European files to March 24 and telegraphic advices to the 25th, reached Halifax on Saturday afternoon. The news is of interest. The annexation of Tuscany to Sardinia had been consummated, a decree to that effect, accepting the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Niagara, with European files to March 24 and telegraphic advices to the 25th, reached Halifax on Saturday afternoon. The news is of interest. The annexation of Tuscany to Sardinia had been consummated, a decree to that effect, accepting the demand of the Etrurians, having been issued

docs.snippet: The steamship Cahawba arrived at this port on Saturday morning, from Havana on the 2d inst. There was nothing new in Havana. The Morocco war fever continued. The Miramon excitement was not over, but was mostly confined to rumors.

headline.main: From Havana.; NEWS UNIMPORTANT--HEALTH OF HAVANA--MARKETS.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Cahawba arrived at this port on Saturday morning, from Havana on the 2d inst. There was nothing new in Havana. The Morocco war fever continued. The Miramon excitement was not over, but was mostly confined to rumors.
